attributes.action: Campaign for RSPCA to investigate cat poisoning
attributes.additional_details: I would like to raise awareness for the cats being killed by anti freeze poisoning. I feel the RSPCA is dialling down the actual importance of this issue and although they deem it "sad" that this is happening, they aren't reporting it enough or raising awareness. I have taken it upon myself to raise awareness, via a Facebook page that it is becoming more common for cats to be poisoned by anti freeze, whether deliberate or accidental.
